name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: dfs.datanode.slow.io.warning.threshold.ms
description:
The threshold in milliseconds at which we will log a slow
    io warning in a datanode. By default, this parameter is set to 300
    milliseconds.

name: dfs.webhdfs.netty.low.watermark
description: Low watermark configuration to Netty for Datanode WebHdfs.

name: ipc.client.rpc-timeout.ms
description:
Timeout on waiting response from server, in milliseconds.
  If ipc.client.ping is set to true and this rpc-timeout is greater than
  the value of ipc.ping.interval, the effective value of the rpc-timeout is
  rounded up to multiple of ipc.ping.interval.

name: fs.s3a.attempts.maximum
description: How many times we should retry commands on transient errors.

name: fs.s3a.committer.threads
description:
Number of threads in committers for parallel operations on files
    (upload, commit, abort, delete...)

name: dfs.client.slow.io.warning.threshold.ms
description:
The threshold in milliseconds at which we will log a slow
    io warning in a dfsclient. By default, this parameter is set to 30000
    milliseconds (30 seconds).

name: dfs.qjournal.http.read.timeout.ms
description:
Timeout in milliseconds when reading from a HTTP connection from remote
    journals.

name: mapreduce.job.cache.limit.max-resources
description:
The maximum number of resources a map reduce job is allowed to
    submit for localization via files, libjars, archives, and jobjar command
    line arguments and through the distributed cache. If set to 0 the limit is
    ignored.
